title: negative rp?
body:
I just bought a champ and now it says I have negative rp which doesn't make sense cuz I had over 1000 rp left from buying gentleman cho gath skin and now I'm in negative rp.

obviously this is a glitch cuz if I didn't have enough I wouldn't have been able to buy the said champ.

replies.body: It's possible to sometimes lose sync with your account balance, and relogging can fix that up.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
This is likely just a visual bug. Re-logging should fix it.
